translation: "I have gained this today; I will fulfill this desire of mine; this is mine, and this wealth will be mine in the future."
commentary: 16.13 This this? Today today? Maya by me? Labdham has been gained? Imm this? prapsye (I) shall obtain? Manoratham desire? This is this? Is there is? This is this? Even also? Me to me? future shall be? Again again? Dhanam wealth.Commentary I will be able to acire all that the world possesses. Then I will be the lord of all wealth. No one will be eal to me on the surface of this earth.In future Next year this wealth
